feed.title: Etherpad Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Etherpad: v2.2.3
entry.content:
bin@2.2.3 generateChangelog D:\a\etherpad-lite\etherpad-lite\bin node --import tsx generateReleaseNotes.ts "refs/tags/v2.2.3"

2.2.3

Notable enhancements and fixes

  • Introduced a new in process database rustydb that represents a fast key value store written in Rust.
  • Readded window._ as a shortcut for getting text
  • Added support for migrating any ueberdb database to another. You can now switch as you please. See here: https://docs.etherpad.org/cli.html
  • Further Typescript movements
  • A lot of security issues fixed and reviewed in this release. Please update.

entry.title: New release for Etherpad: v2.2.4
entry.content:
bin@2.2.4 generateChangelog D:\a\etherpad-lite\etherpad-lite\bin node --import tsx generateReleaseNotes.ts "refs/tags/v2.2.4"

2.2.4

Notable enhancements and fixes

  • Switched to new SQLite backend
  • Fixed rusty-store-kv module not found

entry.title: New release for Etherpad: v2.2.5
entry.content:
bin@2.2.5 generateChangelog D:\a\etherpad-lite\etherpad-lite\bin node --import tsx generateReleaseNotes.ts "refs/tags/v2.2.5"

2.2.5

Notable enhancements and fixes

  • Fixed timeslider not scrolling when the revision count is a multiple of 100
  • Added new Restful API for version 2 of Etherpad. It is available at /api-docs

entry.title: New release for Etherpad: v2.2.6
entry.content:
bin@2.2.6 generateChangelog D:\a\etherpad-lite\etherpad-lite\bin node --import tsx generateReleaseNotes.ts "refs/tags/v2.2.6"

2.2.6

Notable enhancements and fixes

  • Added option to delete a pad by the creator. This option can be found in the settings menu. When you click on it you get a confirm dialog and after that you have the chance to completely erase the pad.

entry.title: New release for Etherpad: v2.2.7
entry.content:
bin@2.2.7 generateChangelog D:\a\etherpad-lite\etherpad-lite\bin node --import tsx generateReleaseNotes.ts "refs/tags/v2.2.7"

2.2.7

Notable enhancements and fixes

  • We migrated all important pages to React 19 and React Router v7

Besides that only dependency updates.

-> Have a merry Christmas and a happy new year. ğŸ„ ğŸ
